title: Sign in to Property Online - Government of Nova Scotia
text: Sign in to Property Online You need to sign in to Property Online to access land ownership and related information collected through Land Registry and other sources. Property Online (POL) provides online access to land ownership and related information collected through the province’s Land Registration Offices and other sources. The Property Online database is available to subscribers. The database contains ownership information, including property maps for the entire province. Help with Property Online If you have technical, image quality, access or billing questions contact Property Online using Ask Property Online a Question. This service doesn’t answer legal or procedural questions. Before you start Make sure you have your username and password.
